com.netflix.fenzo.plugins

Class ExclusiveHostConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.fenzo.plugins.ExclusiveHostConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstraintEvaluator

    public final class ExclusiveHostConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConstraintEvaluator
    This constraint ensures that the host is exclusively assigned to the given job. You may not extend this class.

    The task scheduler gives this constraint special treatment: While usually the scheduler only evaluates the constraints of a new task, if an already-assigned task has an ExclusiveHostRestraint then the host on which the task has been assigned fails this exclusive host constraint check as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.netflix.fenzo.ConstraintEvaluator

      ConstraintEvaluator.Result evaluate(TaskRequest taskRequest, VirtualMachineCurrentState targetVM, TaskTrackerState taskTrackerState)
      Determines whether the prospective host already has tasks either running on it or assigned to be run on it, and returns a false Result if either of those things is the case.

      • evaluate

        public ConstraintEvaluator.Result evaluate(TaskRequest taskRequest,
                                           VirtualMachineCurrentState targetVM,
                                           TaskTrackerState taskTrackerState)
        Determines whether the prospective host already has tasks either running on it or assigned to be run on it, and returns a false Result if either of those things is the case.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface ConstraintEvaluator
        Parameters:
        taskRequest - describes the task to be considered for assignment to the host
        targetVM - describes the host to be considered for accepting the task
        taskTrackerState - describes the state of tasks assigned to or running on hosts throughout the system
        Returns:
        an unsuccessful Result if the target already has running tasks or assigned tasks, or a successful Result otherwise
